articles.title: Sam Altman thinks AI will have ‘novel insights’ next year
articles.description: In a new essay published Tuesday called “The Gentle Singularity,” OpenAI CEO Sam Altman shared his latest vision for how AI will change the human experience over the next 15 years. The essay is a classic example of Altman’s futurism: hyping up the promise of AGI — and arguing that his company is quite close […]
articles.author: Maxwell Zeff

articles.title: OpenAI’s open model is delayed
articles.description: OpenAI was targeting an early summer release date for its open model, which is slated to have similar "reasoning" capabilities to OpenAI's o-series of models.
articles.author: Maxwell Zeff

articles.title: AI storage platform Vast Data aimed for $25B valuation in new round, sources say
articles.description: The AI-friendly data storage startup is raising capital at a giant leap in valuation.
articles.author: Marina Temkin

articles.title: Apple Intelligence: Everything you need to know about Apple’s AI model and services
articles.description: Apple Intelligence was designed to leverage things that generative AI already does well, like text and image generation, to improve upon existing features.
articles.author: Brian Heater, Amanda Silberling

articles.title: OpenAI releases o3-pro, a souped-up version of its o3 AI reasoning model
articles.description: OpenAI has launched o3-pro, an AI model that the company claims is its most capable yet.
articles.author: Kyle Wiggers

articles.title: Google rolls out Android 16 to Pixel phones, unveils AI-powered edit suggestion for Google Photos
articles.description: Google is releasing Android 16 to Pixel phones and rolling out additional updates to other Pixel devices.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: Apple’s upgraded AI models underwhelm on performance
articles.description: Apple has announced updates to the AI models that power its suite of Apple Intelligence features across iOS, macOS, and more. But according to the company's own benchmarks, the models underperform older models from rival tech firms including OpenAI.
articles.author: Kyle Wiggers

articles.title: Enterprise AI startup Glean lands a $7.2B valuation
articles.description: Glean announced on Tuesday that is raised a $150 million Series F led by Wellington Management at a $7.2 billion valuation.
articles.author: Julie Bort

articles.title: At WWDC 2025, Apple sang developers’ praises amid AI letdowns and App Store battles
articles.description: Apple has yet to deliver on some of the key technology advances that could modernize developers' apps for the AI era.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Report: Meta taps Scale AI’s Alexandr Wang to join new ‘superintelligence’ lab
articles.description: Mark Zuckerberg is hand-picking top researchers and engineers to join an upcoming  AI research lab dedicated to “superintelligence," and Scale AI's Alexandr Wang is on the list.
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: ChatGPT is having a partial outage
articles.description: OpenAI experienced a partial outage on Tuesday morning that created elevated error rates in ChatGPT, Sora, and the API.
articles.author: Maxwell Zeff

articles.title: Mistral releases a pair of AI reasoning models
articles.description: Like other reasoning models, Magistral works through problems step-by-step for improved consistency and reliability across topics such as math and physics.
articles.author: Kyle Wiggers

articles.title: Google’s AI search features are killing traffic to publishers
articles.description: Google’s AI Overviews and other AI-powered tools, including chatbots, are devastating traffic for news publishers, per a Wall Street Journal report.
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: Still no AI-powered, ‘more personalized’ Siri from Apple at WWDC 25
articles.description: Apple announced a slew of updates at the Worldwide Developer Conference with one notable exception. It still hasn't revealed its previously announced AI-powered Siri.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: OpenAI claims to have hit $10B in annual revenue
articles.description: OpenAI says it recently hit $10 billion in annual recurring revenue, up from around $5.5 billion last year.
articles.author: Kyle Wiggers

articles.title: From spatial widgets to realistic Personas: All the visionOS updates Apple announced at WWDC
articles.description: Apple’s updates to VisionOS 26, the operating system powering its mixed reality headset, build off last year’s Apple Vision Pro spatial computer that blends digital content with the physical world. At WWDC, Apple announced a range of updates for both consumer and enterprise customers, from new spatial widgets and content to more realistic Personas and more.
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: At WWDC 2025, Apple introduces an AI-powered Shortcuts app
articles.description: Users will be able to access the AI models either on device or with Private Compute to generate responses that feed into the rest of their shortcut.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Apple’s new Workout Buddy helps you sweat smarter
articles.description: Apple has launched at its WWDC 2025 conference Workout Buddy, an AI workout coach. The AI tool gathers data from both your current workout and your fitness history – including paces, miles logged, activity rings closed, and training load – to coach you through workouts in real time.
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: Apple brings Apple Intelligence to the iPhone screen at WWDC 2025
articles.description: Apple said it's bringing Visual Intelligence, its AI-powered image analysis tech, to the iPhone screen in iOS 26.
articles.author: Kyle Wiggers

articles.title: Apple introduces live translation across Messages, FaceTime, and Phone at WWDC 25
articles.description: Apple is introducing Live Translation, powered by Apple Intelligence, for Messages, FaceTime and Phone calls.
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan
